# init(validationMode:)

**Initializer**

Creates a mobile document reader display request options type.

## Declaration

```swift
init(validationMode: MobileDriversLicenseDisplayRequest.Options.ValidationMode = .check)
```

## Parameters

- **validationMode**: The validation mode of the mobile document request.
